name: is-positive-array
description: Checks whether a value is an array with more than zero items

scripts.version-patch:up: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version --force && git add package.json package-lock.json
scripts.version-minor:up: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version --force && git add package.json package-lock.json
scripts.version-major:up: npm version major --no-git-tag-version --force && git add package.json package-lock.json
